title: HoP 195 - Anke von Kügelgen on Contemporary Islamic Thought
itunes:title: HoP 195 - Anke von Kügelgen on Contemporary Islamic Thought
description: Anke von Kügelgen joins Peter to discuss developments over the last century or so, including attitudes towards past thinkers like Avicenna, Averroes and Ibn Taymiyya.
content:encoded: Anke von Kügelgen joins Peter to discuss developments over the last century or so, including attitudes towards past thinkers like Avicenna, Averroes and Ibn Taymiyya.
